text: Yuri Ivanovich Kayurov (; born September 30, 1927) is a Soviet and Russian movie and theater actor. He was honored with the People's Artist of the RSFSR (1979). He was born in Cherepovets. He is known for playing the role of Vladimir Lenin in the movie Lenin in Paris. He is also a stage actor in Moscow.Yuri Kayurov on Maly Theater's site ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1927 births Category:Living people Category:Russian movie actors Category:Russian television actors Category:Russian stage actors
title: Yuri Kayurov
